channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: └── content └── about | └── index.md // <- https://example.com/about/ ├── posts | ├── firstpost.md // <- https://example.com/posts/firstpost/ | ├── happy | | └── ness.md // <- https://example.com/posts/happy/ness/ | └── secondpost.md // <- https://example.com/posts/secondpost/ └── quote ├── first.md // <- https://example.com/quote/first/ └── second.md // <- https://example.com/quote/second/
